description:
29 years old. He is a secret agent of Military Affairs Bureau in the Ministry of the Army, and belongs to one of the most important office known as "Kudan Satellite Office". When rumor was spread about Ministry of Home Affairs` connection with the foreign organization, he was called back from the Harbin Military Secret Service to investigate. His team set their eyes on V shipping company and Alma Trading Company and decide to look in.
Source: Official page
name: Iba Hideomi
